objects.specification: A continuous flat floor surface with a subtle geometric pattern embedded in neutral-toned vinyl. The surface has a low-profile texture that provides traction while maintaining a smooth feel. It extends seamlessly wall-to-wall, creating a cohesive foundation for the classroom environment.

A vertical classroom wall painted in a soft neutral tone with a smooth matte finish. The surface is unadorned aside from light texture typical of painted drywall, forming a clean and inviting backdrop for educational elements.

A vertical classroom wall painted in a soft neutral tone with a smooth matte finish. The surface is unadorned aside from light texture typical of painted drywall, forming a clean and inviting backdrop for educational elements.

A vertical classroom wall painted in a soft neutral tone with a smooth matte finish. The surface is unadorned aside from light texture typical of painted drywall, forming a clean and inviting backdrop for educational elements.

A vertical classroom wall painted in a soft neutral tone with a smooth matte finish. The surface is unadorned aside from light texture typical of painted drywall, forming a clean and inviting backdrop for educational elements.

A flat ceiling panel spanning the entire room, painted in clean white with a smooth finish. It conceals structural elements and serves as a neutral backdrop for ceiling fixtures, with neat shadow lines where it meets the walls.

A small raised platform constructed with a sturdy wooden frame and topped with a slightly darker wood laminate. It stands on low-profile supports to create a distinct elevated area and features beveled edges for a polished look.

A larger teacher's desk crafted from a darker wood tone, featuring a generous rectangular top surface with visible wood grain and a slight sheen. The desk includes integrated drawers on one side with minimalist handles, and its sturdy frame and legs are painted to match the desk surface.

The teacher's chair has a slightly larger cushioned seat upholstered in a matching pastel shade, with a supportive backrest and subtle armrests. The metal frame has a polished finish, and the upholstery is detailed with refined stitching for a professional appearance.

A large whiteboard panel with a smooth glossy dry-erase surface, framed by a thin aluminum border. It spans nearly the full width of the front wall and features a subtle sheen with minimal reflective glare for clear visibility.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a sleek white housing, ventilation grilles, and a prominent lens at the front. It is secured by a minimalist mounting bracket and designed for unobtrusive presence while projecting crisp images.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a warm mid-tone finish, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted hardcover and paperback books. Each shelf has a slight lip to prevent items from sliding, and the unit stands flush against the wall with a clean rectangular silhouette.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a warm mid-tone finish, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted hardcover and paperback books. Each shelf has a slight lip to prevent items from sliding, and the unit stands flush against the wall with a clean rectangular silhouette.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a warm mid-tone finish, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted hardcover and paperback books. Each shelf has a slight lip to prevent items from sliding, and the unit stands flush against the wall with a clean rectangular silhouette.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a warm mid-tone finish, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted hardcover and paperback books. Each shelf has a slight lip to prevent items from sliding, and the unit stands flush against the wall with a clean rectangular silhouette.

A rectangular window with clear safety glass panes set within a slender metal frame painted in a neutral tone. It allows ample natural light to enter and can be opened for ventilation, with simple lines that minimize visual obstruction.

A pair of lightweight fabric curtains in a complementary pastel shade, hanging from a slim curtain rod. They feature a soft drape with subtle natural wrinkles and extend from ceiling to just above the floor to moderate incoming light.

A colorful educational poster printed on durable laminated paper, featuring vivid graphics and informative content. It is affixed to the wall with discrete mounting corners and has a semi-gloss surface to reduce glare while preserving brightness.

A colorful educational poster printed on durable laminated paper, featuring vivid graphics and informative content. It is affixed to the wall with discrete mounting corners and has a semi-gloss surface to reduce glare while preserving brightness.

A wall-mounted round analog clock with a slim metallic frame in a neutral tone. The clock face is white with bold black numerals and hands for clear readability, and a silent quartz movement ensures minimal noise.

A modern ceiling light fixture with a square frosted acrylic diffused cover and neutral-colored housing. It emits uniform soft white illumination and sits flush to the ceiling, providing broad area lighting.

A modern ceiling light fixture with a square frosted acrylic diffused cover and neutral-colored housing. It emits uniform soft white illumination and sits flush to the ceiling, providing broad area lighting.

A rectangular student desk with a light woodgrain finish, showing natural grain patterns with a subtle gloss. The top is supported by slender metal legs in a neutral tone and features gently rounded corners. The desk has a modesty panel underneath and a laminated surface for durability.

The chair features a sturdy metal frame painted in a soft pastel hue, complementing the light wood desks. The seat and back are molded plastic with ergonomic curves and a smooth matte finish. The chair's legs are tipped with protective floor caps.

A decorative potted plant featuring lush green leaves and branching stems, arranged in an unglazed ceramic pot. The foliage has vibrant hues of green and natural leaf texture. It adds a touch of organic life near the room entrance.

A practical waste bin with a cylindrical shape made from durable plastic, finished in matte gray. The bin features a slightly tapered form with a rounded lip and a small capacity suitable for classroom use. It sits flush on the floor without protruding elements.
